content.en: Defect detection revolution: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms, specifically deep Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), to improve defect detection in industrial inspection. These algorithms automatically generate powerful features for detecting defects. Other studies are using adaptive multiscale image collection and convolutional neural networks to automatically inspect surface flaws, while machine learning-based image processing is being used to detect defects in additive manufacturing. These algorithms are trained to recognize and classify defects, improving quality control in various manufacturing processes.
content.da: Defektregistreringens revolution: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer, specifikt dybe konvolutionelle neurale netværk (CNN), for at forbedre defektregistrering i industrieftersyn. Disse algoritmer genererer automatisk kraftfulde funktioner til at opdage defekter. Andre studier anvender adaptiv multiskala billedindsamling og konvolutionelle neurale netværk til automatisk at inspicere overfladefejl, mens maskinlæringsbaseret billedbehandling bruges til at opdage defekter i additiv fremstilling. Disse algoritmer trænes til at genkende og klassificere defekter, hvilket forbedrer kvalitetskontrollen i forskellige fremstillingsprocesser.
